[@microsoft/fast-element/di.js](../fast-element/index.html) &gt; [Injectable](../fast-element.injectable/index.html)

## Injectable type

A class that declares constructor injected dependencies through a static "inject" field array of keys.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Injectable<T = {}> = Constructable<T> & {
    inject?: Key[];
};
```
**References:** [Key](../fast-element.key/)
